text: orkku ka: ninnal ennattil valare kuravayirunna kalam! bhumiyil ninnalann nanne ‎durbakalarayan karutappettirunnat. alukal ninnale ranciyetuttekkumeayennupealum ‎ninnal bhayappettirunnu. pinnit allahu ninnalkk abhayameki. tanre sahayattal ninnale ‎prabalarakki. ninnalkku uttamamaya jivitavibhavannal nalki'a. ninnal nandiyullavarakan. ‎
